faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.pageSubtitle: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our platform
faq.noResults: No questions found matching your search.
faq.contactUs: Our team is here to help. Contact us for personalized support.

items.question: Is the platform compliant with ANAF requirements?
items.answer: Yes, our platform is 100% compliant with Law 141/2025 for VAT and Order 1783/2021 for SAF-T D406.

items.question: How much does it cost to start?
items.answer: The Free plan is permanently available for freelancers. All plans include 14 days free trial.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, there are no long-term contracts. You can cancel or change your plan at any time.

items.question: What support do you offer?
items.answer: We offer support via email, chat, and phone. Pro and Business plans include priority 24/7 support.

items.question: How does the OCR feature work?
items.answer: Our OCR uses AI (LayoutLMv3) to automatically extract data from invoices and receipts with 99% accuracy, optimized for Romanian documents.

items.question: What is e-Factura and do you support it?
items.answer: e-Factura is ANAF's electronic invoicing system mandatory for B2B transactions. Yes, we fully support e-Factura XML generation and SPV submission.

items.question: What is SAF-T D406?
items.answer: SAF-T D406 is a monthly XML reporting requirement per Order 1783/2021. Our platform automatically generates compliant reports.

items.question: Can I import data from other accounting software?
items.answer: Yes, we support import from Excel, CSV, and direct integration with popular accounting systems.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using DocumentIulia.ro. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using DocumentIulia.ro ('Service'), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Service. These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: DocumentIulia.ro provides AI-powered accounting and ERP services for Romanian businesses, including but not limited to: VAT calculation and reporting per Law 141/2025, SAF-T D406 generation per Order 1783/2021, e-Invoice (e-Factura) integration with ANAF SPV, OCR document processing, HR and payroll management, and financial reporting.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: When you create an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use.

obligations.title: User Obligations
obligations.content: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to: use the Service in any way that violates any applicable law or regulation, attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Service, use the Service to transmit any harmful code or malware, or attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Service.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Certain features of the Service may require payment. All prices are in Romanian Lei (RON) and include VAT where applicable. Payments are processed securely through our payment providers. Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled. You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by DocumentIulia.ro and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of our Service without prior written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, DocumentIulia.ro shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the Service in the twelve months prior to the claim.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately. You may export your data before termination through the account settings.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Romania, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms will be resolved in the competent courts of Bucharest, Romania.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. Your continued use of the Service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@documentiulia.ro or through our contact page.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how DocumentIulia.ro collects, uses, and protects your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Romanian data protection laws.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: DocumentIulia.ro is the data controller for the personal data collected through our Service. We are committed to protecting your privacy and processing your data lawfully, fairly, and transparently.

collection.title: Data We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly: account information (name, email, company details, CUI/CIF), financial data (invoices, transactions, tax information), documents uploaded for OCR processing, and communication data. We also collect data automatically: usage data, device information, IP addresses, and cookies.

legal.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legal.content: We process your personal data based on: contract performance (to provide our services), legal obligations (tax reporting, ANAF compliance), legitimate interests (improving our services, fraud prevention), and your consent (marketing communications, optional features).

use.title: How We Use Your Data
use.content: We use your information to: provide and maintain the Service, process your transactions and generate reports, comply with legal obligations (ANAF, tax authorities), send you service-related communications, improve and personalize your experience, detect and prevent fraud and abuse.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your data with: ANAF (for e-Factura, SAF-T submissions as required by law), payment processors (for transaction processing), service providers (hosting, analytics - under strict data processing agreements), and legal authorities when required by law. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

transfers.title: International Transfers
transfers.content: Your data is primarily processed within the European Union. If we transfer data outside the EU, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decisions.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Financial records are retained for 10 years as required by Romanian law. You may request deletion of your data subject to legal retention requirements.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to: access your personal data, rectify inaccurate data, erase your data ('right to be forgotten'), restrict processing, data portability, object to processing, and withdraw consent. To exercise these rights, contact us at gdpr@documentiulia.ro or use the privacy settings in your account.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies for essential functionality, analytics, and preferences. Essential cookies are necessary for the Service to function. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie consent tool.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including: encryption in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256), regular security audits, access controls and authentication, secure data centers within the EU, and incident response procedures.

changes.title: Policy Updates
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. We encourage you to review this policy regularly.

contact.title: Contact & DPO
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries or to exercise your rights, contact our Data Protection Officer at: gdpr@documentiulia.ro. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Romanian Data Protection Authority (ANSPDCP).

sessions.securitySettingsDescription: Manage your active sessions, trusted devices, and security preferences
sessions.activeSessionsDescription: Manage all devices connected to your account
sessions.loginActivityDescription: View your login history and suspicious activity
sessions.autoLogoutTimeoutHelp: The time of inactivity after which you will be automatically logged out (5-1440 minutes)
sessions.maxConcurrentSessionsHelp: The maximum number of devices you can be logged in on simultaneously (1-10)
sessions.notifyNewDeviceHelp: Receive an email when your account is accessed from an unrecognized device
sessions.notifySuspiciousActivityHelp: Receive an email when we detect unusual behavior
sessions.trustedDevicesHelp: Trusted devices don't require additional verification
sessions.timeoutValidationError: Timeout must be between 5 and 1440 minutes
sessions.maxSessionsValidationError: Number of sessions must be between 1 and 10
sessions.signOutAllOtherSessionsDescription: Revoke all active sessions on other devices. Your current session will remain active.
sessions.confirmRevokeAll: Are you sure you want to revoke all other sessions? This action cannot be undone.
sessions.securityTip1: Regularly review active sessions and revoke unrecognized devices
sessions.securityTip2: Only trust devices that are your personal devices
sessions.securityTip3: If you notice suspicious activity, change your password immediately
sessions.securityTip4: Use two-factor authentication for enhanced security
